mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_record (user_id, status, book_id, end_date, duration, review) VALUES (#{userId}, #{status}, #{bookId}, #{endDate}, #{duration}, #{review})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, status, book_id AS bookId, end_date AS endDate, duration, review FROM book_record WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, status, book_id AS bookId, end_date AS endDate, duration, review FROM book_record WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, status, book_id AS bookId, end_date AS endDate, duration, review, record_at AS recordAt FROM book_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND book_id = #{bookId}
